General.Name: Ningbo PIA Automation Holding Corp. A
General.Description: Ningbo PIA Automation Holding Corp. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells high-end intelligent manufacturing equipment in the mobility, commercial goods, consumer goods, and healthcare fields. The company was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Ningbo, the People's Republic of China. Ningbo PIA Automation Holding Corp. is a subsidiary of PIA Automation Holding GmbH.
